para.text: dialog box shows the names of files that should be saved in an archive of the model. It is displayed by selecting

ModelMuse keeps track of many of the files that need to be archived. For example all the model input files will be listed here as well as Shapefiles from which the user has imported information. If there are other files that should be archived that are not listed, use the
dialog box to keep track of where they are.
Each file is listed on a separate line. If a file that should be archived does not exist at the recorded location, its name will be displayed with a red font.
button is clicked, the user will be prompted to enter a file name for an archive of the model. The archive will be a .zip file containing all the files listed on the
dialog box. By default, the archive name will be the name of the ModelMuse file with the date appended to the name and the extension changed to .zip.
